name: Hotel Barcelona Catedral

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hotel Barcelona Catedral in May of 2011 and were very pleased. We had an opportunity to spend a couple days in Barcelona again and didn't hesitate to book another stay. We were very glad we did. Upon arrival, we were greeted very warmly as repeat visitors. We had anticipated that our room wouldn't be available due to our arrival time in Barcelona (8:30 am) and were able to store our luggage. When we returned in the afternoon, our room was ready. A few minutes after we entered our room, reception surprised us with a complimentary bottle of Cava and fruit. Very unexpected and appreciated.
reviews.title: First Visit Great, Second Even Better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The hotel is in the perfect location for visiting Barcelona. When we return, we will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great Hotel in the heart of Barcelona City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Excellent location and highly recommend this hotel. Very nice, quiet place, clean room and good service, breakfast was expensive but luxury. Rooftop small poolarea, near by the Cathedral area was wonderful. Few minutes walk to La Rambla, Placa de Catalunya, Gothic Quarter... and metrostations. Lovely place to spend wonderful holiday!
reviews.title: Everything You'd Want

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Location, comfort, level of service, pool...it has it all. Right around a quiet corner from the Cathedral and a short walk to almost everywhere you would walk. I have absolutely nothing negative to say! Price was not bad either.
reviews.title: Excellent!
Wonderful
reviews.text: Highly recommend this hotel. Very good location right next to the cathedral and 5 min walk to Las Ramblas. Very clean and new looking hotel with great, friendly and informative staff. Rooftop pool great to relax with large comfy beds. Pool towels provided. All in all this hotel is perfect for a stay in Barcelona and would definately return when I go back.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found Hotel Barcelona Catedral to be of excellent standard with friendly staff, a well equipped room with all the expected amenities, an unrivalled central location and superb breakfast! It is difficult to see how one could find something better!
reviews.title: Best in Barcelona?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I spent a considerable time searching out a good hotel for my wife and myself to stay in for four days and nights. I chose the Barcelona Catedral because it has what I wanted. I wanted the four stars and got it. I wanted the central arae of the city and got it. Barcelona is a big place yet quite compact and here in the Barri Gotic area you are very close ot everything. There are buses, the Metro, and so many lanes to walk around. This hotel is really by the Cathedral yet in a side road and very quiet. We took the A2 Aerobus from the airport and got off at Placa Catalunya where its only a 2 or 300 metre walk to the hotel. It cost 5 euro.90 each oneway. Only took 20 minutes.The rooms are just what you need for comfort with big beds and a great bathroom with all the clean towels and hot water and gels and shampoos you could wish for.
reviews.title: Great hotel in a great location in a great city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The guys at the reception are just the best. No matter what you require or want to know, they are right on it. Good english as well.
reviews.title: we will certainly return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We opted for breakfast and that was lovely. Good bread, hot and cold dishes, loads of tea and coffee and juice,just right to set you up for a days walking and sightseeing.Everything is cooked to order so there is nothing of the fast food factor with everything lying in its own juices for hours.
reviews.title: location location location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We did look at the pool area although it was March and I'm sure a bit cold to dip ones feet into but I'm sure it will be great in the summer after all the heat and clamour of the city. All in all, an extremely wonderful and enjoyable city and hotel.
reviews.title: Very good hotel in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for three nights in February and it was our first trip to Barcelona. The hotel was situated in a fantastic location in the old city, almost right opposite the Gothic Cathedral and within a 5 to 10 minute walk to La Ramblas or the Harbourfront.
reviews.title: Great Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were soundproofed and it was generally very quiet for a hotel considering its location. The service at the front desk was always helpful and smiley, one member of staff in particular seemed to be able to switch from fluent spanish, to english to french all in a matter of seconds!
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel in excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: The room itself was spacious, the bed seemed to be exceptionally firm which took a bit of getting used to! I'm not sure it needed to be quite as solid as that! It had a kettle and cups which was important to me, although you have to pay to use their teabags or coffee. So we knew this in advance and brought our own (I tend to drink other types of tea anyway). It's got a modern slick feel to the hotel and there were a couple of things which were not finished very well in the room, one of the cupboard doors didn't open fully because it stuck on the floor and in the bathroom the shower door wasn't flush on the edge so we had to make sure the door was inside the shower else the water went all over the floor! The shower was great though, nice and powerful. I had a bath one night and it filled up very quickly.
reviews.title: Lovely rooms, great location, would definitely stay again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lights by the bedside were touch and you could alter their strength which was handy.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel - perfect location!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We didn't eat at the restaurant, they offered a breakfast buffet for 18euro but we decided to find other alternative options (some great thick hot chocolates and churros!) They were a bit outside or our price bracket. They had a nice outside seating area where you can enjoy a drink though, although we never really saw anybody doing that.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Wonderfull hotel, calm, relaxing ambience so trendy!
reviews.title: BEST LOCATION, FASHION TERRACE & SWIMINGPOOL ON THE ROOF

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The terrace is one of the best gifts ever!
reviews.title: The best hotel to visit the real Barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: friendly and familiar staff, ask them for advice, information!
reviews.title: one of the best hotels in barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Best location ever, in the center, just near the gotic fantastic to mixt with the authentic Barcelonean ambience !
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In the middle of the historic Barcelona. Perfect transport comunications. 30 minutes to airport. Excellent service, and very very nice swiming pool !!!!! Be quiet in the center of this magnific city .
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Location alone is a great reason to stay at this hotel. Walk a few metres from the front door and you're standing in front of the Catedral.
reviews.title: Solid Four Stars

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The friendly staff welcomed us at arrival and had prepared everything in advance of check-in so there were no delays. Service was very, very good.
reviews.title: An Oasis

likes.liked: — position, helpful staff, quietness and cleanliness

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel restaurant is open only for breakfast and lunch. As there are so many fine restaurants in the area, we never visited. Wireless internet is free, but be careful of the TV as it fairly aggressively attempts to steer you to pay channels. There is a pool and terrace, but we did not consider the amenities to be useful in January.
reviews.title: Not the cheapest but very good quality and supreme location.

likes.liked: — Amazing location and the high quality of facilties.
likes.disliked: — Not enough time to enjoy the hotel, the city is too addictive!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The mattress was too firm, but the beds were nontheless comfortable. The room was quiet and clean with a few minor exceptions.
reviews.title: We loved it here best hotel ever......!

likes.disliked: — The bed was a bit hard

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is another hotel I researched here at TA and wonder why it isn't rated more highly. Perhaps it is the price, however TA appears to quote only the in-season rate. I found this hotel to be quite reasonably priced and a very good value considering its location. There are other hotels on the plaza that appear to be in need of upgrading as opposed to this modernly decorated inn.
reviews.title: Perfect City Hotel!

likes.liked: — Location, Extremely friendly & helpful staff & super Japanese Restaurant opposite!
likes.disliked: — Very warm rooms, corridors extremely hot!

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.text: Once we'd found the hotel we found it an excellent location to set up base for a 3 day stay! Great facilities and near to all the major attractions. Staff were fantastic and couldn't have been more helpful. Wold have no hesitation in recommending this hotel to you.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I went to Barcelona with a friend and we stayed at this hotel. The Location is amazing. its in the Goth quarter and is practically walking distance to either everything you need or walking distance to the transport to get you to the other parts of town. Hotel was clean, spacious and very helpful staff, the breakfast was great but the only negative was the bar....bar tender was a little grumpy and had the worse margarita i have ever had! Anyway, on the bright side it was perfect for what we needed and i would definitely stay there again. Great value for money.
reviews.title: fab location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This modern hotel is ideally placed just round the corner from the Gothic Cathedral, an excellent central location for a 4 day visit to Barcelona. Rooms are spacious and clean and the staff are very friendly and helpful. We drove into the city from another area of Spain and there is parking available underneath the hotel - quite expensive but cheaper than the majority of car parks in the city. The breakfast is varied with a good selection of both cold and hot food. We were on the first floor and even though the hotel was busy our room was quiet with no noise in the corridors or adjoining rooms to disturb our sleep. An excellent hotel, within easy walking distance to many of the tourist attractions and also near metro and buses.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in central location
Fab hotel, fab location
reviews.text: Stayed for 3 nights, had rooms 303 & 304, perfect for travelling with two teenagers as we all had our privacy (additional large door shutting our two rooms off from the hall). Located right in the centre, walk everywhere inc beach, shopping street just behind hotel and easy metro to nou camp for the football (catalunya to Maria Cristina direct about 15 mins, then 10 min walk to stadium). Rooms were spacious and clean, beds large and comfy, no noise at night, reception staff very friendly, great pool terrace on top overlooking barcelona and wonderful "chocolate box" next door for goodies! Will def stay at this hotel again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The best part of this hotel is the location. For tourists interested in the Gothic area, this is the best location. It is close to a busy avenue with taxis and transportation to other parts of the city, but when you walk out of the hotel it opens onto a large plaza in front of a cathedral. The hotel itself is clean and the rooms are large. The rooftop pool is unheated, so it was too cold to really enjoy while we were there. Also, the rooftop is on the same level as neighboring buildings so they can watch you. Not that private. The bathroom was sort of odd. The shower had a half glass door. It looked very modern but water tended to get everywhere. The people were nice. We didn't try the restaurant, but it was busy.
reviews.title: Very Modern and Best Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel has a central location in Barcelona. All staff is very friendly. The rooms are modern, spacious and very clean. The breakfast all-in has many choices and is of a very good quality. Perfect hotel for a city trip in Barcelona!
reviews.title: No remarks about this hotel, all great!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed here with our daughter and her boyfriend. We chose this hotel because it was central to all attractions and easy to walk into the city and to the beach without having to use public transport all the time. It did not disappoint us; it was a clean and friendly hotel. The rooms were well equipped and comfortable and the staff were very helpful making recommendations and arranging taxi's or advising on how to find places of interest. We were able to catch the Barcelona tourist tour bus from the square to take us to different places of interest.We were pleased with the rooms and the hotel. Breakfasts were good and so was the service; we would stay here again on future visits. It was also a very quiet hotel with no disturbances outside to wake you during the night which often happens in city centre hotels.
reviews.title: Beautiful Barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013
reviews.text: It was my partners 30th birthday and we stopped here. The staff , management was fantastic . Ordered room service and after a little mix up , when it came it was fantastic . So couldn't of wished for anything more
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed here in July 2010 and would most definitely return! Wonderful location, minutes to the cathedral and old streets of Barcelona..about 10 minutes to the main shopping area. For a hotel in the centre it was lovely and quiet. We ate in the hotel just once, but the food was delicious if slightly more pricey than you would find in the city. Our room was large (we had a suite with a private terrace backing onto the pool) but there were two adults and a young baby with lots of accompanying paraphernalia and so needed the space! They really welcomed the baby too unlike lots of places that aren't so accommodating! The standard rooms were ample sized too I thought...and most importantly they were clean and fresh! Staff were incredibly friendly and polite! Wonderful place and I would advise anybody to check it out! Don't expect allot from the pool though - it was a lovely place for a drink and a dip but not one to choose if you wanted to keep up a fitness regime! Good length but narrow! Lucky that certainly wasn't top of my agenda!
reviews.title: Perfect location & lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here 4 nights after our cruise. We got there a bit early they were nice enough to keep our luggage, and let us join their free walking tour (which was lovely).
reviews.title: Very comfortable. Excellent Location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were modern, clean, and comfortable.
reviews.title: Loved it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2 things I didn't like: 1) 20 Euros charge for TV 2) the shower door is really illogically placed.
reviews.title: Perfect location, clean and quiet!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: This was the final stop of an 11 day tour of spain with my husband and another couple. By far this was the nicest most modern property that we stayed at during our trip. The rooms are very nice, although it had the smallest rooms of all of the hotels but it was not uncomfortable. Our room faced the interior courtyard so it was very quiet although the hotel is located on a very small street without much traffic so I can't imagine that the rooms facing the street are noisy. The front desk staff was very nice and accommodating, expecially Alex. The location is great, walking distance to Las Ramblas, the waterfront and many Gaudi buildings. There are 3 Metro stops within in 2-3 blocks. The rooftop pool was great and relaxing, not very large but it was never overly crowded. The room does not have a dresser for clothing but a nice sized closet in the room. No iron in the room but available if you ask, there is a hair dryer in the bathroom and the bathroom was very nice, modern and clean. I can't say enough good things about this property.
reviews.title: Best option in Barcelona city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is located in the Gotic area of Barcelona. We walked out of the hotel and were able to walk in a beautiful square. Lots of cafes and of course the Cathedral.
reviews.title: FANTASTIC

description: Valued as excellent for 93% of its clients, the Barcelona Catedral Hotel, 4* Boutique, has an unbeatable location in the Gothic, next to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. The Barcelona Catedral Hotel is exclusive, modern and comfortable. It has swimming-pool, gym, terrace-chill out, parking, restaurant with outdoors terrace and smoking area, free Internet on business centre, free wifi, meeting rooms. Its restaurant 4 Capellans, offers Mediterranean cuisine, à la carte, lunch menu, banqueting, coktails, catering. An spectacular outdoor terrace is the perfect place for events and celebrations. SPECIAL MENUS FOR COELIACS AND OTHER DIETARY NEEDS. Cultural activities: Every Wednesday night and Sunday morning, the hotel proposes complimentary walks through the Gothic quarter, Legends and Secrets. Gastronomic activities: Cooking lessons, Cooking Team Building for companies and wine tasting. Wifi INCLUDED for ALL Hotel guests Barcelona Catedral.
